snippet: San Antonio’s overheated arena and LeBron James, who missed the final minutes of Game 1 of the N.B.A. finals with leg cramps, were said to be doing better on Friday afternoon.
abstract: Miami Heat star LeBron James is set to return for Game 2 in NBA final series against the San Antonio Spurs after missing final minutes of first game due to leg cramps; malfunctioning air-conditioner at AT&T Center in San Antonio, which contributed to heat-induced cramps, has been repaired.
lead_paragraph: San Antonio’s overheated arena and LeBron James, who missed the final minutes of Game 1 of the N.B.A. finals with leg cramps, were said to be doing better on Friday afternoon.

headline.main: James and Air-Conditioning Are Expected to Return for Game 2
headline.print_headline: James and Air-Conditioning Are Expected to Return for Game 2
